name: project-2
description: # Project Name: PC Parts aka PCP # PCP is a one stop shop for buying and selling used pc parts. # PCP uses Node and Express web server # Database is created and managed using MySQL with a Sequelize ORM # Using both a GET and POST routes for retrieving and adding new data # Deployed to Heroku with data # Using a Passport as a new technology for user login # Utilize Handlebars for server-side templating
